text: Fattoush (Arabic: فتوش) Can be transliterated from the Arabic in different ways, such as fattush, fatush, fattoosh, and fattouche is a Lebanese salad. It includes toasted or fried pieces of pita bread, combined with chopped raw vegetables.Wright, 2003, p. 241 A sauce with a slightly sour taste is put on the salad.Sauce ingredients: water & cornstarch heat until thickened. Off heat, mix in lemon juice, garlic, sumac, salt, and pepper. Toss salad in sauce. == References == Category:Appetizers Category:Salads
title: Fattoush
